ComicInfo.Summary: VCR tapes, recordable dvds, and episode 22 of Moonlighting; what happens in a world where passions run too strongly, when obsession creates new understanding? What is Ultimate Sanity and what does it have to do with dogs who can't reach the water bowl? Join Chris Howells, Zeke Moore, Andrew Dreiser, and a troll named Dogberry on a collective unconscious journey into the unknown. And remember, enlightenment is only a mini-van impact away.
ComicInfo.Title: All the Extravagances of an Irregular Fancy
